title: New: Lapalux – BETHR
content:
With Lapalux’s debut LP due out next month via Brainfeeder, we’ve been treated to this new cut via his Youtube channel.

Taking the well-worn Rozalla sample and running with it, in admittedly a direction that you’d be forgiven for thinking was relatively ill-advised, he’s managed to create something that’s overwhelmingly beautiful, but beautiful all the same.

Nostalchic is due out on Brainfeeder this March.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
